page.title: 02Employment
page.content: In winter Hedon Growers import Spanish cucumbers.Hedon Growers was established at Burstwick and it was at Hedon too,where they grow tomatoes and cucumbers.When Hedon Growers was at Hedon and Burstwick,Burstwick grew tomatoes but they got a disease in the second season.In 1985 Hedon Growers decided to change their oil boilers to coal after they had been on oil for 15 years or more because coal is cheaper than oil.Hedon Growers boilers are finished but there is still the landscaping to do.East Coast Salads is now the transporting agency which takes the cucumbers all over the country.The employment at Hedon Growers is 104 people.
